left the door open for a campaign to become Indiana's governor. The Indianapolis Star said on its website that Mike Pence , 51, made his announcement in a letter being sent to supporters. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence and wife Karen said in the letter.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for Barack Obama in 2012.'' RGA Mike Pence decision`` major coup'' for RGA- David Catanese: Mike Pence decision`` major coup'' for RGA Indiana Mike Pence isn't running for president, which means a gubernatorial run is almost inevitable. Mike Pence won't formally announce his gubernatorial campaign on Thursday-a state law prohibits announced candidates from raising money during the state legislative session, scheduled to end April-but he fully intends to run for governor, a source with knowledge of his thinking told POLITICO. Mike Pence was Perry's first recruitment call after he became chairman, a source with knowledge of the call told POLITICO, and Mike Pence met in Washington on Wednesday with Virginia Gov.
